text.name: sys_description
text.text: This collection groups all your favorited games in your library. In a way, this is the "best of" in the world of retro-gaming, catered to your personal taste. Mario, Sonic, Castlevania, Tomb Rider, Tony Hawk, GTA, Final Fantasy, etc. come to mind. All the usual sorting filters are available here too for you to quickly find your childhood games.
